review_body: Great and luxurious hotel in the heart of the chaos of Tokyo, the transition from outside to the top floor of the building where the hotel is located is relaxing in itself. Luxurious facilities as expected, especially with the pool and the main lobby area. Staff are really incredible which is consistent with most hotels in Japan. A great way to spend a special couple of days in the city, although book if you're not too busy since you'll enjoy the hotel too much.

■Location:Midtown in Tokyo.位置：東京ミッドタウン■Our stay condition:泊数For 1 night一泊■Room:部屋Type: a one bed room deluxe twinデラックス・ツイン・ルームLocation: Nice with a city view眺望：街並みAirconditioner: Comfortableエアコン：快適Lighting: Sufficient照明：十分TV: 1setテレビ：１台Bath & Shower : Excellentバス＆シャワー：素晴らしいToilet: 1roomトイレ：１室Free Wi-Fi: AvailableフリーWi-Fi：利用可能Mini Bar & A fridge: Availableミニバー：利用可能Safety box: Availableセイフティー・ボックス：利用可能Gym & Pool: Available. I recommend the pool because gorgeous.ジム＆プール：利用可能。プールはおすすめ。■Response of staff: Perfectスタッフの対応：完璧■FoodBreakfast & Dinner: Delicious & gorgeous with a nice city view at the Member's Lounge. You can only enjoy a special sake here. Amazing!食事：朝食&夕食：メンバーズ・ラウンジでシティービューを楽しみながら、美味しい料理（ビュッフェ）を楽しめる。ここでしか飲めないお酒あり。最高！■Others私の誕生日祝いでここをチョイス。スタッフが、私が行く先々で、おめでとうございます！を連呼。これには、感激した！その他：I stayed here for my birthday celebration. every staff said "Happy Birthday"to me wherever I went. It was impressive!

I just arrived after spending 5 nights at The Ritz in Tokyo. Love the hotel. The common areas, the spectacular views and stunning floral arrangements in the lobby were all next level. The food and service for breakfast was incredible friendly and the food was delicious. The bar service was excellent. So many little extra touches for making a traveller travelling alone feel so comfortable. I highly recommend the hotel and would not hesitate to stay here again. The room was spacious clean and very well appointed. The gym was great as well. Unfortunately I did not get a chance to use the spa but definitely will on my next visit. I spent a lot of time deliberating where to stay and I am delighted with my decision. The location and attached shopping centre with cold rainy weather was a huge plus! If I had to point out one small thing it would be that the room could use a paint refresh. A small concession after such incredible service!!
